properties.name: backdropOpacity
properties.description: Set backdrop opacity by value from 0..1.

properties.name: fullScreen
properties.description: Set up full screen option of dialog modal

properties.name: borderColor
properties.description: Set up border color for dialog content

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.description: Set up background color of backdrop

properties.name: contentFullWidth
properties.description: Set up full width of content

properties.name: dialogStyleObject
properties.description: Styles object responsible for styles which will be applied to dialog node

properties.name: datepickerContainer
properties.description: Apply styles of mobile datepicker design to dialog

properties.name: overflowCheck
properties.description: Check overflow depend on it option
